column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So good! We are from Texas
column2: looking for that Chicago kind of meal
column3: and were recommended this place by many friends. I would say it didn't disappoint. The service at this particular location was excellent. Everyone was very friendly
column5: and more than generous with allowing us to try Chicago beers before deciding on one. We recommend the lemon pepper dry rub wings as an appetizer & the pizza of course! I know everyone goes for the deep dish
column6: but the thin crust is excellent too. Whatever you do
column7: don't forget to enjoy the delicious butter crust! This is a must!!!
